title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy for Work & Career
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Work and Career audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Work and Career audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Career Confidence
body:
This Career Confidence guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need more confidence at work.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Confidence can lead to a high level of productivity in the workplace. It can help you get more things done since you are certain of what you can and cannot do. This means that you can use your strengths to your advantage and at the same time, improve on your weaknesses. This sense of self-awareness is key towards career success, as you achieve more goals you have set for yourself.  If you feel you have been lacking some confidence in the workplace then this audio  will restore your self-belief, so you act in a confident manner in the workplace, helping you to be more driven, more focused, ambitious and positive. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to feeling more confidence at work.
teaser: This Career Confidence guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need more confidence at work.

title: Creativity & Ideas
body:
This Creativity & Ideas guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to learn the skill to be more creative in order to spark more ideas. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Rarely do brilliant ideas appear out of the blue. They take time, consideration and more than a little effort to develop. But, you don’t have to be a creative genius to come up with them, it's a skill you can learn and become a master at.  This audio will help you train yourself to be more creative, be able to think of more ideas and increase your creative ability on a day by day basis.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being more creative and having more ideas.
teaser: This Creativity & Ideas guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to learn the skill to be more creative in order to spark more ideas.

title: Powerful Public Speaking
body:
This Powerful Public Speaking guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need to have more confidence, learn to practice and prepare more, overcome nervousness and deliver exceptional public speaking moments.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Public speaking is a great way of building personal development on many levels, since improving communication skills is helpful in almost every area of life. Whether your goal is to engage in political debate, make a career as a motivational speaker or gain confidence in front of an audience, public speaking can help you meet your goal. If you have been feeling some anxiety and worry when you have been asked to present or deliver a public speech, then this audio will help you to feel calm, persuasive, in control and confident. You will be able to give powerful public speeches that convey all your points articulately and with comfortable ease while captivating your audience. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to deliver a powerful public speech.
teaser: This Powerful Public Speaking guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need to have more confidence, learn to practice and prepare more, overcome nervousness and deliver exceptional public speaking moments.

title: Improved Memory & Concentration
body:
This Improved Memory & Concentration guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to improve their memory and be able to concentrate more.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Is it really possible to improve your memory? If you've ever found yourself forgetting where you left your keys or not being able to concentrate at an important time and wishing your focus and memory was a bit better? Fortunately, there are plenty of things that you can do to help improve your memory and concentration, as the brain’s incredible ability to reshape itself holds true when it comes to learning, memory and focus. This audio will help give you natural ways to help sharpen your memory and increase your focus and concentration. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to having better memory and concentration.
teaser: This Improved Memory & Concentration guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to improve their memory and be able to concentrate more.

title: Imposter Syndrome
body:
This Imposter Syndrome guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who constantly experience feeling like they don’t fit their role.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Have you ever felt like you don’t belong? Like your friends or colleagues are going to discover you’re a fraud, and you don’t actually deserve your job and accomplishments? If so, you’re in good company. These feelings are known as impostor syndrome, or what psychologists often call impostor phenomenon. An estimated 70% of people experience these impostor feelings at some point in their lives.  The audio will help you to focus on your strengths and successes, so you keep a positive internal dialogue to improve your self-confidence and self-belief. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to having more self-belief.
teaser: This Imposter Syndrome guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who constantly experience feeling like they don’t fit their role.

title: Business Meeting Presence
body:
This Business Meeting Presence guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to have more presence and impact in a business meeting. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Meetings in essence, are meant to boost productivity and efficiency. When everyone is on the same page and aware of what should be done, even the most challenging tasks can be completed. Love them or hate them, you can’t completely eliminate meetings. So it’s important to make them as useful and constructive as possible and make sure that your contribution is impactful and useful.  If you have noticed that in business meetings recently that you seem to be lacking some executive presence, then this audio will help you to be engaged, speak up, share your thoughts and ideas and have the self-confidence and presence you need in meetings to really stand out.. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to a business meeting presence.
teaser: This Business Meeting Presence guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who want to have more presence and impact in a business meeting.

title: Releasing Stress at Work
body:
This Releasing Stress at Work guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are feeling overwhelmed and stressed at work to the point their job is interfering with their work performance, health or personal life.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Stress isn’t always bad. A little bit of stress can help you stay focused, energetic, and able to meet new challenges in the workplace. It’s what keeps you on your toes during a presentation or alert to prevent accidents or costly mistakes. But in today’s hectic world, the workplace too often seems like an emotional roller coaster. Long hours, tight deadlines, and ever-increasing demands can leave you feeling worried, drained, and overwhelmed. And when stress exceeds your ability to cope, it stops being helpful and starts causing damage to your mind and body—as well as to your job satisfaction. This audio will help you take steps to manage your stress, helping you to feel more calm and in control of your workload and your emotions. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to feeling less stressed at work.
teaser: This Releasing Stress at Work guided meditation and hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are feeling overwhelmed and stressed at work to the point their job is interfering with their work performance, health or personal life.
